title: Bump mio from 0.8.9 to 0.8.11

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [mio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/mio) from 0.8.9 to 0.8.11.
Changelog

Sourced from mio's changelog.

0.8.11

  • Fix receiving IOCP events after deregistering a Windows named pipe (tokio-rs/mio#1760, backport pr: tokio-rs/mio#1761).

0.8.10

Added

  • Solaris support (tokio-rs/mio#1724).
Commits
  • 0328bde Release v0.8.11
  • 7084498 Fix warnings
  • 90d4fe0 named-pipes: fix receiving IOCP events after deregister
  • c710a30 Add v0.8.x to the CI
  • c29e21c Release v0.8.10
  • f6a20da Add Solaris operating system support (#1724)
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=mio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.8.9&new-version=0.8.11)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. title: Bump shlex from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [shlex](https://github.com/comex/rust-shlex) from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0.
Changelog

Sourced from shlex's changelog.

1.3.0

  • Full fix for the high-severity security vulnerability RUSTSEC-2024-0006 a.k.a. GHSA-r7qv-8r2h-pg27:
    • Deprecates quote APIs in favor of try_ equivalents that complain about nul bytes.
    • Also adds a builder API, which allows re-enabling nul bytes without using the deprecated interface, and in the future can allow other things (as discussed in quoting_warning).
    • Adds documentation about various security risks that remain, particularly with interactive shells.
  • Adds explicit MSRV of 1.46.0.

1.2.1

  • Partial fix for the high-severity security vulnerability RUSTSEC-2024-0006 a.k.a. GHSA-r7qv-8r2h-pg27 without bumping MSRV:
    • The bytes { and \xa0 are now escaped by quoting functions.
Commits
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=shlex&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.2.0&new-version=1.3.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---

title: Bump zerocopy from 0.7.25 to 0.7.31

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [zerocopy](https://github.com/google/zerocopy) from 0.7.25 to 0.7.31.
Release notes

Sourced from zerocopy's releases.

v0.7.30

What's Changed

  • [policies] Document yanking policy by @​joshlf in google/zerocopy#677
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#680
  • [readme] Link to GitHub Releases (#692) by @​joshlf in google/zerocopy#693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/google/zerocopy/compare/v0.7.29...v0.7.30

v0.7.29

What's Changed

  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#664
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#668
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#669
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#670
  • Implement TryFromBytes for [T] by @​jswrenn in google/zerocopy#666
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#673
  • [derive] Fix AsBytes for #[repr(C, packed(N))] by @​maurer in google/zerocopy#672
  • Release 0.7.29 by @​joshlf in google/zerocopy#676

Full Changelog: https://github.com/google/zerocopy/compare/v0.7.28...v0.7.29

v0.7.28

What's Changed

  • Improve transmute*! documentation by @​jswrenn in google/zerocopy#661
  • Improve AsBytes documentation by @​jswrenn in google/zerocopy#660
  • [docs] Fix typo in include_value! doc comment by @​joshlf in google/zerocopy#662
  • Release 0.7.28 by @​joshlf in google/zerocopy#663

Full Changelog: https://github.com/google/zerocopy/compare/v0.7.27...v0.7.28

v0.7.27

What's Changed

  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#618
  • Safety comments quote new bit validity guarantees by @​joshlf in google/zerocopy#462
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#621
  • [CI] Bump github/codeql-action from 2.22.6 to 2.22.7 by @​dependabot in google/zerocopy#622
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#623
  • [CI] Bump step-security/harden-runner from 2.6.0 to 2.6.1 by @​dependabot in google/zerocopy#625
  • [ci] Roll pinned stable toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#624
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#626
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#628
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#629
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#631
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#634
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#635
  • [CI] Bump github/codeql-action from 2.22.7 to 2.22.8 by @​dependabot in google/zerocopy#636
  • [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain by @​google-pr-creation-bot in google/zerocopy#637

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from zerocopy's changelog.

Changelog

Releases

We track releases and release notes using GitHub Releases.

Yanks and Regressions

0.7.27, 0.7.28

These versions were briefly yanked due to a non-soundness regression reported in #672pull-672. After reconsidering our yanking policy in #679issue-679, we un-yanked these versions.

Commits
  • 7d3a8f9 Fix soundness hole in Ref::into_ref and into_mut (#721)
  • 961612f [readme] Link to GitHub Releases (#692) (#693)
  • 449b78c [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain (#680)
  • 8f7d88b [policies] Document yanking policy (#677)
  • 5b76223 Release 0.7.29 (#676)
  • 941c83f [derive] Fix AsBytes for #[repr(C, packed(N))] (#672)
  • d18d233 [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain (#673)
  • ac0c27e implement TryFromBytes for [T] (#666)
  • 122828e [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain (#670)
  • 980dd98 [ci] Roll pinned nightly toolchain (#669)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=zerocopy&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=0.7.25&new-version=0.7.31)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself.
